name: Chance of Chivalry
description:
How to play:

Main Menu Navigation: 
Enter to select, arrow keys to change selection

Gameplay:
Keep the hero away from the princess for as long as possible! Click to place walls to guide the hero into mystery traps and monsters.

A red X will appear if a wall cannot be placed (either from blocking the hero's path completely or if the tile is not empty)

Mystery Tile Effects:

When the hero steps on a mystery tile, 1 of 4 things can happen:

1. Increase Hero Speed: The hero will gain a speed boost, up to a max of +2. Indicated by the speed arrows attached to the hero.

2. Monster Spawn: A monster will spawn on a random, open tile.

3. Teleport Hero: The hero is teleported to a random, open tile on the map (for better or worse)

4. Lose a Tile: You lose the ability to place one of your walls, making it easier for the hero to navigate your obstacles.
